name: sdc-boost
description: SDC Boost - Browser extension to enhance SDC.com with powerful modules and features

scripts.release: git pull --rebase && bumpp --no-push && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --follow-tags
